result.eng: If you go out on a stormy day, you will see it.
result.ga: Má théann tú amach lá stoirme feicfidh tú é
result.orig: Má théann tú amach lá stoirme feicfidh tú é
result.html: Má théann tú amach lá stoirme feicfidh tú éIf you go out on a stormy day, you will see it.
result.ponchtml: Má ṫéann tú amaċ lá stoirme feicfiḋ tú éIf you go out on a stormy day, you will see it.

result.eng: A story about a little girl who goes to the wood.
result.ga: Scéal faoi chailín beag a théann isteach sa choill
result.orig: Scéal faoi chailín beag a théann isteach sa choill
result.html: Scéal faoi chailín beag a théann isteach sa choillA story about a little girl who goes to the wood.
result.ponchtml: Scéal faoi ċailín beag a ṫéann isteaċ sa ċoillA story about a little girl who goes to the wood.

result.ga: Cathain a théann tú ag snámh
result.orig: Cathain a théann tú ag snámh
result.html: Cathain a théann tú ag snámhWhen do you go swimming?
result.ponchtml: Caṫain a ṫéann tú ag snáṁWhen do you go swimming?

result.eng: How often do you go to plays? - Very seldom.
result.ga: Cé chomh minic is a théann tú chuig drámaí - Go fíorannamh
result.orig: Cé chomh minic is a théann tú chuig drámaí - Go fíorannamh
result.html: Cé chomh minic is a théann tú chuig drámaí - Go fíorannamhHow often do you go to plays? - Very seldom.
result.ponchtml: Cé ċoṁ minic is a ṫéann tú ċuig drámaí - Go fíorannaṁHow often do you go to plays? - Very seldom.

result.eng: What time do you go to work?
result.ga: Cén t-am a théann tú ag obair
result.orig: Cén t-am a théann tú ag obair
result.html: Cén t-am a théann tú ag obairWhat time do you go to work?
result.ponchtml: Cén t-am a ṫéann tú ag obairWhat time do you go to work?

result.eng: What time do you go to bed/to sleep?
result.ga: Cén t-am a théann tú a chodladh
result.orig: Cén t-am a théann tú a chodladh
result.html: Cén t-am a théann tú a chodladhWhat time do you go to bed/to sleep?
result.ponchtml: Cén t-am a ṫéann tú a ċodlaḋWhat time do you go to bed/to sleep?
